thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 15 of 97
thread.title: KDKC

author: KDKC
title: KDKC
text: Product was as described but was received outside of the shipping estimate which were long to begin with but was told by Hawkings Books (outside vendor of Biblio) it was due to rains. Some confusion on shipping because notice of shipping came 4 days after ordering but there was no progress on the tracking information for a week. When called was told it was like that because they presort their orders and request the tracking info but that updates wouldn't happen until the package was actually in the system. Ordered 1/12 Shipping notification 1/16 first update 1/23 package delivered 1/27.
